MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 23-MAR-2021 12:30.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the LL33 postcode area of Llanfairfechan, affecting properties in a widespread area. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and became aware of this at 7:48 am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because further investigations are required to locate the fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:30 pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:59 am on 23rd March, 2021.
